item.title: Apollo Staffers Move to New Zurich Office in Fresh Blow to UK
item.description: Private markets giant Apollo Global Management Inc. is tapping one of the world’s biggest wealth hubs with plans to build a team of 50 people over the next three to five years at a new office in Zuric
